channel.title: 317 exion hp bar?

item.title: 317 exion hp bar?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

A lot of people want this and a lot of people are being greedy and won’t give it up.

I suggest downloading a PI based server AND client and look for the new HP bar in the client if it has one. cough Eudora’s World has the new HP bar as an option along with a lot more things
You COULD look in there for the code, copy & paste it into your client.java but make sure you don’t get errors

Read full topic
